channel.title: Runescape: Console version
channel.description:
Runescape developer Jagex has revealed a console version of its browser-based fantasy MMO is something it keeps considering, the arrival of Xbox 360, Wii and PS3 making such more tempting than ever before. "It's certainly more interesting with the current generation of consoles of course because they're far more internet-connected than the previous generation and it just wasn't worth looking at", the game's creator Andrew Gower told CVG recently. "But with the PS3 and Xbox 360 and the Wii, it's much more tempting, I have to say". Talking about PS3 specifically, Gower said that Jagex could probably get Runescape running on the machine right now, adding overall that "Technically porting the game to different platforms isn't a huge amount of work." However, he explained the reason the developer's "slightly reluctant" to bring the MMO to too many different platforms "is because the more platforms that we're on, the more we have to update in parallel and that would slow us down." "We've always tried to be a very agile company whereby if the players say they want something, or there's something not quite right, we'll fix it there and then", Gower said. "We're loath to lose the rapid response... that we've got at the moment, and the more platforms we go to the more than happens, so it's a bit of a trade off." Gower said there was nothing he could talk about at the moment regarding actual plans to bring Runescape to console. The game, which consists of both free and subscription versions, recently hit one million subscribers and boasts over 5 million active players.
[b]Source:[/b] http://www.computerandvideogames.com/article.php?id=167285 It would be pretty interesting to see this done and could up their members :) Edit: it is pretty old but i only just heard about it :)

item.title: Runescape: Console version
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:9, topic:186097”]The way to impliment it would be my question. How would things work? Would you go buy the keyboard attachment for the Ps3 or would you control it with the real controller? If so, then how? There’s so many things that just wouldn’t make sense.

How do you begin running, how do you stop?
How do you woodcut, how do you burn logs?
How do you equip items and then fight?
ect.

The game just isn’t made to be on the Ps3 or any console.[/quote]

Apparently you never used the PS3…

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape: Console version
item.dc:creator: @Holic Holic
item.description:
@Holic wrote:

At least combat would be interesting if they did this.
Hold A for 360, X for PS3, and Z for Wii to run?
Make it like an online version of Elder Scrolls? As for the keyboard, headset for the 360 at least.
Could be interesting. If I working with Jagex, I would release info like this on the net and see what people can think up of on how the game would work and secretly base it off it. It would at least simplify some things.
As for the updating problem he talked about, just keep one being RuneScape and the console one being something stupid like RuneScape: The Omega Runes, some sort of spin-off of RuneScape you could say. That way they wouldn’t have to worry about the console version slowing down the updates for the browser version. Only offer console updates like once a month or longer.

cooper:

Darnit, the title made me think you meant an i-fiction/mud version of runescape

Me too

-Holic

Read full topic
